basics.name: Om Khare
basics.label: MS CS at Georgia Institute of Technology

education.institution: College of Engineering Pune Technological University

work.name: Technology Summer Analyst
highlights: Designed and implemented a clustering algorithm to categorize comparable privilege session requests, identifying 20% of them with similar characteristics. This led to the automation of these grouped sessions, resulting in a monthly savings of approximately 100 man-hours for the organization.

Performed sentiment analysis on employee comments on knowledge articles to determine content effectiveness. An increase of 15% in positive feedback was observed, and the results were presented in the form of an analytical dashboard.

work.name: Research Intern
highlights: Developed an On-Device Graph Database from scratch by providing a SPARQL parser to handle READ, INSERT, DELETE, and FILTER query operations on RDF data
Outperformed expected performance metrics of 1 ms query plan execution and 20k minimum operations per second while maintaining storage size of approximately twice the raw data size
ACID properties were ensured by implementing reader-writer locks and multi-threading.

work.name: Research Assistant
work.position: Mechanical Department, Cummins College of Engineering, Pune
highlights: Worked under the guidance of Prof Abhishek Patange to explore the application of machine learning with an emphasis on the white-box model in mechanical domain. 1 paper submitted to a journal.

projects.name: Laboratory Inventory Management System (LIMS)
highlights: Project done for a chemical lab at an ordnance factory under Department of Computer Engineering, COEP Technological Univeristy

Core member of the student-led software development club in the college with 30 members. Responsible for overseeing client interactions and effectively coordinating project timelines and deliverables, ensuring successful project execution.
Led a team of 20 coordinators to build and deploy the app and website for Mindspark’22, COEP’s Annual National Level Technical Fest, which got 30k+ unique visitors.
Conducted an App Development Workshop using MIT AppInventor software for underprivileged girls from a rural school in Pune.
Associated with the Paakhi initiative in providing laptops to rural schools in Pune.

skills.name: Machine Learning
keywords: NLP - NER, Summarization, Sentiment Analysis, Language Modelling

awards.title: Winner
awards.summary: First prize amongst 120+ teams across the nation

awards.title: 2nd Rank
awards.summary: 2nd prize in Hackathon conducted by PICT College. Also got a chance to work for a startup
